q: Reuters)- Chrysler Group Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne vowed to keep the automaker on top of the minivan segment in the North American market and said the company will develop a new type of minivan by 2014. We're not going to give one inch of territory in terms of our domination of( the minivan) segment, Sergio Marchionne said to workers at the Windsor Assembly Plant on Tuesday, where the Dodge Grand Caravan and the Chrysler Town& Country minivans are made.
